charges.charge_description: 18:1703 DELAY OR DESTRUCTION OF MAIL OR NEWSPAPER (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby placed on probation for a term of 12 months. A special assessment of $100.00 is to be paid immediately. The court imposes a $500.00 fine. (1)

charges.charge_description: Title 18:1073 Being a Postal Service employee, unlawfully secret, destroy, detain, delay, and open three first class parcels which came into his possession and which were intended to be conveyed by mail and carried and delivered by carriers and other employees of the Postal Service [1:96-m-153]
